snippet: The earnings report delivered a bleak picture for a company that has tried to appeal to a younger clientele by teaming up with pop stars and retooling some of its signature salons.
abstract: Elizabeth Arden points to celebrity fragrance lines as contributing factor in steep drop in sales for fiscal fourth quarter; reports net sales fell close to 30 percent to $191 million for three month period ending June 30th; sales for year fell to $1.1 billion, from $1.3 billion in 2013.
lead_paragraph: The earnings report delivered a bleak picture for a company that has tried to appeal to a younger clientele by teaming up with pop stars and retooling some of its signature salons.

headline.main: Celebrity Fragrances Add to Slide at Elizabeth Arden
headline.print_headline: Stars’ Scents Add to Slide at Company in Cosmetics
